meanings.definition: Make or become smaller in size, amount, or degree.
meanings.sent3: Skipping breakfast lessens the joy of a morning meal.
meanings.sent4: A kind word lessens the weight of a heavy heart.
meanings.sent5: Each drop of rain lessens the drought's grip on the land.

meanings.sent1: Rest lessens the pain in my muscles.
meanings.sent2: Medicine lessens the symptoms of a cold.
meanings.sent3: Laughing lessens the seriousness of the situation.
meanings.sent4: A hug lessens the sting of a harsh word.
meanings.sent5: A smile lessens the tension in the room.
